application.name: 企业门店官网DIY制作-官网DIY_商城_点餐_预约版
application.author: 不错吧

manifest.install: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_zofui_sitetemp_address`; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_sitetemp_address` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `openid` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'openid', `address` varchar(2000) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '地址等', `tel` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '联系电话', `isact` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0不是默认的，1默认的', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `openid` (`openid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=12 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_zofui_sitetemp_admin`; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_sitetemp_admin` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `openid` varchar(64) DEFAULT '', `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '类型 0商城管理员 1卡券核销员', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `openid` (`openid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_zofui_sitetemp_appoint`; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_sitetemp_appoint` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `number` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '排序，越大越前', `thumb` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `desc` varchar(800) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '描述', `form` mediumtext, `price` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '支付金额', `ispay` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0支付 1关闭支付', `createtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间', `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0正常 1下架', `tips` varchar(800) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '预约后提示', `num` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '已约数量，虚假', `realnum` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '真实的预约数量', `admin` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '管理员openid', `pic` varchar(1500) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '轮播', `istel` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0不授权手机号 1必须授权手机号', `tel` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '接收通知手机号', `sortid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '预约id', `content` mediumtext COMMENT '详情', `istime` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0不设置 1设置时间段', `timedata` text, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `number` (`number`), KEY `admin` (`admin`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=10 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_zofui_sitetemp_appointorder`; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_sitetemp_appointorder` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `openid` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `orderid` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `fee` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '金额', `title` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `ispay` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否支付 0未支付 1已支付', `createtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间', `formid` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `form` text, `aid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '对应的预约项目id', `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0待支付 1待接单 2已接单 3已完成 4已取消 5已退款', `uorderid` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `tel` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '电话', `apptime` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `openid` (`openid`), KEY `orderid` (`orderid`), KEY `aid` (`aid`), KEY `uorderid` (`uorderid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=6 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_zofui_sitetemp_appsort`; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_sitetemp_appsort` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `number` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '排序序号 越大越前', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `number` (`number`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_zofui_sitetemp_article`; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_sitetemp_article` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `content` mediumtext COMMENT '文章内容', `title` varchar(2000) DEFAULT NULL, `img` varchar(350) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '封面图片', `number` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '排序 越大越前', `time` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '时间', `readed` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '阅读量', `author` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '作者', `sortid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '分类id', `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0自己添加 1url', `url` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `number` (`number`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=104 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_zofui_sitetemp_artsort`; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_sitetemp_artsort` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `number` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '排序序号 越大越前', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=34 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_zofui_sitetemp_auth`; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_sitetemp_auth` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `isshop` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0关闭商城 1开启', `sms` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '剩余短信数量', `isclosecopy` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0开启版权 1关闭版权', `isdesk` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0关闭餐桌管理 1开启餐桌管理', `isappoint` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0关闭 1开启', `iscard` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0关闭 1开启卡券', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=25 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_zofui_sitetemp_bar`; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_sitetemp_bar` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `data` text COMMENT '内容', `createtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间', `tempid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '对应的模板id', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `tempid` (`tempid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=86 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_zofui_sitetemp_card`; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_sitetemp_card` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '卡券名称', `start` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '使用开始时间', `end` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '使用结束时间', `thumb` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '封面图', `usetype` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '使用场景 0在线领取，线下使用核销 1商城系统 2预约系统', `isbind` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否绑定商品使用 0所有商品 1绑定的商品下单时使用', `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0代金券 1折扣券', `value` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '面值', `useleast` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '使用订单金额条件', `content` text COMMENT '详情内容', `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0正常 1下架', `stock` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '库存', `taked` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '已领取', `used` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '已使用', `usetime` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '可使用时间 天', `limittime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '限制领取次数 0不限制', `isshare` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0可转发 1不能转发', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `start` (`start`), KEY `end` (`end`), KEY `stock` (`stock`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_zofui_sitetemp_cardlog`; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_sitetemp_cardlog` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `openid` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `cardid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '卡券id', `end` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '结束时间', `createtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间', `status` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0正常 1已使用 2已过期', `usetime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '使用时间', `hexiaoer` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '核销人', `usetype` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '类型 0官网 1商城 2预约', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `openid` (`openid`), KEY `end` (`end`), KEY `cardid` (`cardid`), KEY `hexiaoer` (`hexiaoer`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_zofui_sitetemp_cart`; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_sitetemp_cart` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `openid` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `gid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '商品id', `ruleid` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `num` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '数量', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `openid` (`openid`), KEY `gid` (`gid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=12 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_zofui_sitetemp_copyright`; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_sitetemp_copyright` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0开启 1关闭', `content` text, `type` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `tel` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `pic` varchar(2000) DEFAULT NULL, `params` varchar(3000) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`status`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_zofui_sitetemp_desk`; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_sitetemp_desk` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `number` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '编号', `name` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '桌号', `plug` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0商城 1点餐', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=11 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_zofui_sitetemp_form`; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_sitetemp_form` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `data` mediumtext COMMENT '内容', `createtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间', `isread` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0未读 1已读', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=7 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_zofui_sitetemp_good`; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_sitetemp_good` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `title` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `number` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '排序，越大越前', `thumb` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `pic` varchar(3000) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '轮播图', `isexpress` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0开启快递 1关闭快递', `expressmoney` decimal(5,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '运费金额', `isselftake` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0关闭自提 1开启自提', `shoptel` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '店铺号码', `shopaddress` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '店铺地址', `oldprice` decimal(8,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '原价', `price` decimal(8,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '现价', `content` mediumtext COMMENT '详情', `sales` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '销量', `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0正常 1下架', `stock` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '商品库存', `createtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间', `rulearray` text COMMENT '规格数组', `isrule` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0无规格 1有规格', `icon` varchar(3000) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '标签', `sortone` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '1级分类id', `sorttwo` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '二级分类id', `realsales` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '真实销量', `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0普通支付下单 1提交预约 2拼团 3拼团加单独购买', `iscanbuy` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0开启 1关闭', `desc` varchar(800) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '描述', `isprice` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0显示价格销量 1关闭', `vurl` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `isaddex` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0叠加运费 1不叠加', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `stock` (`stock`), KEY `sortone` (`sortone`), KEY `sorttwo` (`sorttwo`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=291 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_zofui_sitetemp_goodsort`; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_sitetemp_goodsort` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `number` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '排序序号 越大越前', `img` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0 正常 1下架', `parent` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '上级id 0是一级分类', `tempid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '模板id', `plug` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0商城 1点餐', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `number` (`number`), KEY `parent` (`parent`), KEY `tempid` (`tempid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=99 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_zofui_sitetemp_order`; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_sitetemp_order` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `orderid` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '订单编号', `openid` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `fee` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '金额', `title` varchar(125) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '订单标题', `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0未支付 1已支付 2已发货 3已完成 4已退款', `taketype` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '1快递配送 2上店自提', `mess` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '留言', `createtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间', `paytime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '支付时间', `sendtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '发货时间', `comtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '完成时间', `refundtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '退款时间', `address` varchar(2000) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '收货信息', `expressname` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '快递名称', `expressnum` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '快递编号', `tel` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '自提联系电话', `code` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '兑换编码', `uorderid` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '微信订单号', `formid` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '表单id', `hexiaoer` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '核销员', `refundmoney` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '退款金额', `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0普通订单 1快速下单订单', `sendmoney` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '配送费用', `paytype` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0在线支付 1货到付款', `formdata` varchar(3500) DEFAULT NULL, `deskid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '餐桌id', `progress` text COMMENT '进度', `plug` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0商城 1点餐', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `openid` (`openid`), KEY `orderid` (`orderid`), KEY `createtime` (`createtime`), KEY `paytime` (`paytime`), KEY `comtime` (`comtime`), KEY `uorderid` (`uorderid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=30 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_zofui_sitetemp_orderform`; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_sitetemp_orderform` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '名称', `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '类型', `number` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '越大越前', `ismust` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0必填项 1不必填', `sitem` varchar(3000) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '选项', `pla` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '提示内容', `plug` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0商城 1点餐', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `type` (`type`), KEY `number` (`number`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_zofui_sitetemp_ordergood`; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_sitetemp_ordergood` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `gid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '商品id', `costexpress` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '订单金额', `num` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '购买数量', `price` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '单价', `money` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '总金额', `ruleid` varchar(125) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '购买规格id', `oid` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '订单编号', `cartid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '购物车id 用来删除购物车数据', `rulename` varchar(350) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '规格名称', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `gid` (`gid`), KEY `oid` (`oid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=33 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_zofui_sitetemp_page`; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_sitetemp_page` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `params` mediumtext COMMENT '内容', `createtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间', `name` varchar(800) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '备注页面名称', `tempid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '所属模板id', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `tempid` (`tempid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=274 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_zofui_sitetemp_print`; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_sitetemp_print` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '名称', `code` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '商户编码 或用户名', `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '类型 0飞印 1飞鸽', `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0正常 1禁用', `key` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '密钥', `devno` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '设备编号', `plug` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0商城系统里的 1预约系统里的', `times` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '打印联数', `isbig` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '1放大', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_zofui_sitetemp_product`; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_sitetemp_product` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `content` mediumtext COMMENT '文章内容', `title` varchar(2000) DEFAULT NULL, `img` varchar(350) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '封面图片', `number` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '排序 越大越前', `sortid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '分类id', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `number` (`number`), KEY `sortid` (`sortid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_zofui_sitetemp_prosort`; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_sitetemp_prosort` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `number` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '排序序号 越大越前', `img` varchar(600) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_zofui_sitetemp_set`; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_sitetemp_set` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `params` mediumtext, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_zofui_sitetemp_sms`; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_sitetemp_sms` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `key` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `secret` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `signature` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `template` varchar(2000) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_zofui_sitetemp_smtp`; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_sitetemp_smtp` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0网易 1QQ', `account` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '发送账户', `pass` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '授权码', `name` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `sign` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_zofui_sitetemp_temp`; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_sitetemp_temp` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `createtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间', `name` varchar(800) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '备注名称', `number` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '排序 越大越前', `img` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '图标', `isact` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0未使用 1使用中', `issystem` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否系统模板 0不是 1是 系统模板不能删除修改', `issetsystem` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否平台自己设置的系统模板 0不是 1是的', `sort` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '所属分类id', `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0官网系统模板 1商城系统模板', `showqr` varchar(300) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '演示二维码', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `number` (`number`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=82 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_zofui_sitetemp_tempsort`; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_sitetemp_tempsort` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '名称', `number` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '越大越前', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_zofui_sitetemp_vicead`; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_sitetemp_vicead` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0开启 1关闭', `content` text, `type` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `uid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `params` varchar(3000) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`status`), KEY `uid` (`uid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
